jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Oversee the operations of the finance department, including the designation of an organizational structure for achieving the department's goals and objectives 
● Proactively work with VP to prepare and issue policies, standard operating procedures and flowcharts to improve and add value to the business process and internal controls 
● Design a system architecture that maintain on disbursement, collection and reconciliation processes 
● Assist the annual budgeting, monitoring and controlling the company expenses 
● Maintain the billing system and perform payment reconciliation payment to partner/vendor/merchants 
● Manage outsourced functions team to support finance operationalization

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor degree from a reputable university with major in Finance, Accountancy, Banking, Business Studies, Administration, Management or equivalent
  • At least 3 years of experience in a public accounting firm (Big 4 is preferable)
  • Minimum of 5 years of relevant accounting and/or finance experience
  • Preference given to candidates that currently hold a similar position within a large established corporation
  • Bi-lingual Bahasa Indonesia and English
